title: FS: 1888 Goodwin Champions N162 Cap Anson (HOFer)

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Goodwin Champions N162 Cap Anson (HOFer)
posts.post_content:
The following card is available for sale or trade.

1888 Goodwin Champions N162 Cap Anson. Tough HOFer.

Graded: SGC 10. Nice looking front. Paper loss on the back.

Asking price: Was:$1450

               NOW $1300 FIRM shipped

Payment by Check, MO, or Paypal.

Email trade offers to: [URL="crazylocomerk@yahoo.com"]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/URL]

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.  Thanks for looking.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/FCVCI/Scan20011a.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/FCVCI/Scan20012a.jpg[/IMG]

Bump.  

Card is now also available for trade.

In trade: I'm looking for HOFers (especially Wagner/Cobb/Matty/Johnson/Young), or any scarce 19th Century/Tobacco/Caramel/Bakery cards.

Bump.  Card price lowered.  Now: $1450

Email me if interested.

Bump.

Card is still available.  Price lowered to $1300 shipped.

Price is FIRM.
